name: Ultimate Turbo Pinball Wars - in Space! (UTPW)
name_original: Ultimate Turbo Pinball Wars - in Space! (UTPW)
description:
Ultimate Turbo Pinball Wars - in Space! (UTPW) is a swift and colorful version of the classic Pinball games for up to four players. Two teams engage in an interstellar confilict with each other. It's all about skill, strategy and map control!

Many years have passed since the release of classic Pinball game "3D Pinball - Space Cadet". Now the popular game genre returns to space - but this time it's an epic fight between two expanding species for the supremacy in space!

Lots of items, two maps with unique special features, colorful special effects, rockets, UFOs and much more provide a more fun pinball experience than ever before! Hold your nerves and keep track of the mayhem to bring your enemy to his knees.

Use of gamepads is highly recommended for this game!

Also check out: Resurrection Nightmare

This game was developed in cooperation with Hochschule der Medien Stuttgart, Germany, during fall semester 2019/2020.
